title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 258 - Persons Certifying Food As Halal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 258 - Persons Certifying Food As Halal

State Regulations
§ 258.1 - Statement of qualifications of persons certifying food as halal
§ 258.2 - Registration of persons certifying non-prepackaged food as halal

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 258

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§ 18[6], 201-g[1], [2]; L. 2005, ch. 529

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
